ygData.subject: Re: Re: Re: [EverQuest] Sony sucks!
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, it hadn t even been a month... So I shouldn t have to worry about that. I guess I can t blame Sony too much. It s my Discover card being retarded again.
ygData.messageBody:
Well, it hadn't even been a month... So I shouldn't have to worry about that. I guess I can't blame Sony too much. It's my Discover card being retarded again.
luv,
-Su

======= At 2005-04-27, 04:11:00 you wrote: =======

>Not sure if it has changed but thought when your
>subscription is up, your characters only stay for 3
>months after that they are deleted.
>
>--- Su <suceress@...> wrote:
>> Well, I had to resubscribe at a higher price to get
>> my account back but I got it back. I haven't logged
>> in to see my characters yet though. I was still a
>> bit irritated when I finally got it fixed.
>> Sony's customer service is really lacking these
>> days. I mean, it wasn't always the best but it has
>> really deteriorated.
>> luv,
>> -Su
